description: This file defines an API client module for a web frontend application. It sets up an axios instance for HTTP requests with configurable base URL and authorization headers, includes error handling via interceptors, and exposes helper functions for common HTTP methods (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE). It also provides a method to set or clear the authorization token used in API requests.

methods.name: setAuthToken(token)
methods.description: Sets or clears the Authorization header (Bearer token) on the shared axios instance.

methods.name: http.get
methods.description: Performs a GET request, returning the response data.

methods.name: http.post
methods.description: Performs a POST request, returning the response data.

methods.name: http.put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request, returning the response data.

methods.name: http.patch
methods.description: Performs a PATCH request, returning the response data.

methods.name: http.delete
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request, returning the response data.
